gp.gloss: a physician who is not a specialist but treats all illnesses

gp bomb.gloss: a large bomb (500 to 2,000 pounds that is 50% explosive) whose explosion creates a blast and whose metal casing creates some fragmentation effect

gpa.gloss: a measure of a student's academic achievement at a college or university

gpo.gloss: an agency of the legislative branch that provides printing and binding services for Congress and the departments and establishments of the federal government

gps.gloss: a navigational system involving satellites and computers that can determine the latitude and longitude of a receiver on Earth by computing the time difference for signals from different satellites to reach the receiver
